summary: Orvar's Tomb Remastered is a remake of the first dungeon I (Örvar "Wheeze" Arnórsson) ever made, which was 2.5 years ago when Creation Kit came out.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://puu.sh/aXVxf/d00cbd7233.png[/img]﻿

Orvar's Tomb Remastered is a remake of the first dungeon I (Örvar "Wheeze" Arnórsson) ever made, which was 2.5 years ago when Creation Kit came out. I made this over a weekend to celebrate getting 3000 followers on my twitch livestreaming channel and to pay homage to where I started as a level designer and where my channel took off. This dungeon has the same general layout and the same name but everything else has been remade from scratch. It's still a really short dungeon but hopefully this shows where I have come as a level designer over the years.
The entire process of making this dungeon was streamed over at my twitch channel: [url=http://www.twitch.tv/wheeze202]http://www.twitch.tv/wheeze202[/url]﻿ - check out the schedule for when I stream next!

The dungeon itself isn't substantial. It's really short but it does feature a simple boss fight with a special weapon as a reward and the dungeon is hooked up to the skyrim quest objective generator(radiant quests) so downloading this dungeon will seamlessly add a dungeon to an empty area of skyrim([url=http://puu.sh/aXWiK/dae56361d2.jpg]picture of the location[/url]﻿)


[youtube]ZUvZFAuymsc[/youtube]

[url=http://www.twitch.tv/wheeze202][img]http://puu.sh/aXX0z/ec611372a9.png[/img][/url]﻿﻿﻿[/center]
author: Wheeze
